quest.name: Shadows of the Empire
journal: Auphiliot would be most grateful if you could hunt down some Garlean interlopers in his stead.
A number of the Garleans responsible for the disappearance of the sylph elder remain in the area. Investigate the specified locations, and vanquish any Garleans you come upon.
The Garlean intruders are no more. Report your success to Auphiliot.
Thanks to your efforts, the Garleans have been driven off, and a small measure of peace has returned to the Twelveswood. At least for the moment.
objectives: Investigate the specified locations and defeat Garleans.

dialogue.name: AUPHILIOT
dialogue.text: Yer back, lasslad, an' somethin' tells me ye've not come for a flagon o' Buscarron's ale. All the better, that. I just overheard some Garlean stragglers was seen in the Twelveswood, an' ye know they're not like to be up to any good.

dialogue.name: AUPHILIOT
dialogue.text: Me? Why, I'd like nothin' more than to gut those imperial whoresons meself, but I fear I've─hic!─other...duties...to attend this day. We're countin' on ye, lasslad!

dialogue.name: AUPHILIOT
dialogue.text: Saw to those Garlean dogs as swift an' sure as I saw to me pint o'─er, me duties, did ye? On behalf of old man Buscarron an' me compatriots here at the Druthers, ye have─hurk!─me gratitude, an' then some.

dialogue.name: AUPHILIOT
dialogue.text: What with ye an' meself seein' to matters, lasslad, I tell ye: no flagon o' mead or Garlean troublemaker on or around these premises is─hic─safe!
